Help. My MRA game isn't working.
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Help. My MRA game isn't working.
By Rovest R. Yakuto on Friday, September 6, 2002 - 12:38 pm:

After 7 months of MRA Fun, my game has stopped working. I can start a game or continue but it won't save. It wsa a gift from my sis, and is used *I don't buy used MR cartrige games* so I dunno if the game was misshandled before i owned it.
I think its the Save battery. And i've read the Faqs here and I know Not to Reset if something goes wrong.
But I've never fixxed a GBA game nor do I know what kind of battery the new GBA games used. Is there anything i can do?

By Rovest R. Yakuto on Friday, September 6, 2002 - 06:11 pm:

well I've repaired many GB games, Snes, a few GBC, and 7 N64 games.
I used to work at my parents video store. I had Made it a part of my job to keep all games working. I've fixed my old PSX, Now clean my PSx and PS2 once every 60 days. I clean my GB, GBC, and GBA games once every 8 months and check them so often too.

I try to keep Maintenance on all my olf systems 2 times a year * Snes, Gamegear, GBC, Turbograph Sega cd, N64* so just incase I find a game I'm looking for. Like I found 3 turbograph16 games i'd been looking for almost 11 years :p

I guess i'll just buy another MRA game and just see if i can figure out how to Fix this GBA game.
If i do fix it i'll make a set of instructions for this site if you like. Tho if its like most save problems its ether the battery is low on energy or the game is now malfuntioning do to the power flux damage it has recived from being rapidly turned off and on.
